rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with seating and entertainment zones. Large windows for natural light. Vastu alignment ensures energy flow from the East.
Open plan kitchen integrated with living area. Ventilation ensured by large east-facing window and exhaust vents aligned with Vastu principles.
Master bedroom located in the north-east corner for enhanced positivity and light. Includes ensuite bathroom attached.
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light from east-facing windows.
Guest bedroom located in the north-east area to ensure positive energy. Includes private balcony if possible.
Additional room that can serve as a study or guest space aligned with natural light from east/west exposure.
Main family bathroom centrally located with natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large front door facing north for welcoming light and airflow. Vastu recommends north entrance.
Backdoor aligning with south direction, ideal for garden access and ventilation.
Large windows on the east side for maximum morning sunlight.
Windows ensuring cross-ventilation from west, balancing the overall design.

garden.description: Large garden spread over plot with landscaping that enhances privacy and relaxation. Features include water bodies or fountains for serenity.

pool.description: Swimming pool area located towards the west side of the property to take advantage of natural light during sunset and ensure proper ventilation. Designed with safety features and Vastu in mind.
